title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 300.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 300.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Unless otherwise stated, terms used in these regulations are as defined in GBL section 198-a or 198-b. (b) The term administrator
shall mean a professional arbitration firm or individual appointed by the Attorney General to administer the program. Notes

300.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
